name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of July 26, the Qingpu District Petition Bureau in Shanghai.
The owners of Phase 2 of China Merchants Panlong Mansion petitioned the developer for cutting corners, reducing specifications, and other issues. The authorities dispatched a large number of police forces to maintain stability.
During the period, the owners clashed with the police and many owners were arrested

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Taiwan's Foxconn announced plans to deploy major investments in Henan. 
Subsequently, the Henan Village Bank depositors group issued a major risk warning letter and called Foxconn, asking Foxconn to invest cautiously and be careful not to lose all the money.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 26, Guiyang, Guizhou, Guiyang University of Economics and Technology was exposed for over-enrollment. The school leaders privately increased the enrollment quota from 600 to 3,000. As a result, 2,400 students were not enrolled in the school. That night, students gathered together to protest for their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Around the early hours of July 27, a car hit pedestrians at Yuehu Market in Changsha, Hunan. Insiders said the cause of the attack was related to a demolition dispute, and many people were killed and injured at the scene. The victim's family also said that the government had been blocking the news since the incident, and the community urged the family to send the body to the funeral home.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Weifang, Shandong. A man climbed onto the roof of a police car and shook it, performing strange behaviors, and was subdued by police officers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Beijing. An old man talks about why he is not interested in the Paris Olympics. "What if I win a gold medal? My children still can't find a job and their lives are affected. Why would I think about that?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Xiangyang, Hubei, a video of the 2024 graduation ceremony of Niushou No. 1 Middle School went viral online. The video showed that a student referred to Niushou No. 1 Middle School as "Niuma No. 1 Middle School" during a speech on stage. Then the teacher came on stage to criticize the student in public and took away the student's certificate of excellence.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Scene
On July 25, the Party Secretary of Mazha Village, Puning City, Guangdong Province was stabbed to death by someone with a knife while picking up a package.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 22, Pengxi, Sichuan. A woman posted a video saying: She went to the traffic police team to do business, knocked on the door three minutes in advance, and was told by the traffic police that she was disrespectful and disturbed others' rest. "Any man who marries you will be unlucky for eight lifetimes."
Official announcement: She has been suspended from her duties and will be dealt with in accordance with regulations and disciplines.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Chinese must be ranked ahead of you"
On July 26, in the final of Hunan TV's "Singer 2024", Canadian singer Vanshia, who was expected to win the championship by the audience, lost the duel with Chinese singer Tan Weiwei. Kazakh singer Dimash whispered to her, "They said 'It must Chinese before you'". Vanshia said with relief, "Ok, it's no problem"
However, the microphone was not turned off at the time, causing this conversation to be recorded in the live broadcast, sparking heated discussions among netizens.
That night, Na Ying won the final of "Singer 2024".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: CCTV was unable to respond in time to the live broadcast of the opening ceremony of the Paris Olympics on July 26 due to the presence of a large amount of LGBT content. Subsequently, "CCTV commentary was silent" became a hot search on Weibo. Currently, the topic of "CCTV commentary was silent" has been banned.

It caused netizens to complain

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 25, the Chinese Ministry of Defense stated: The United States has long become a veritable "empire of lies". The United States is a fraudulent and unscrupulous rumor-mongering country, which is accelerating its credibility bankruptcy. In response, netizens left messages in the comment section, calling on the government not to send the giant pandas to the United States.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 24, Zhengzhou, Henan. The woman said that she had been working at "Xiaoyi Network Media Company" since June 6, and because she had not signed a contract, the wages of 20 to 30 employees in the company were all in arrears. When the woman went to the company to ask for her wages, she was dragged by two strong men, and then lifted up and violently thrown out of the company, resulting in multiple abrasions all over her body.

name: 李老师不是你老师

As of now, this speech has been deleted by Weibo, NetEase and other platforms.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 26, Shandong. The developer of Dongcheng Lijing Community sold parking spaces at high prices, not allowing owners to rent parking spaces, and hired security guards to block the owners from entering the community. During the period, the owners and security guards had physical conflicts and pushed each other. An uncle yelled, "They are all scum of society!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 27, Shanghai. According to reports, affected by Typhoon Gemi, the city generally experienced 6-8 gusts, and the strongest gusts in some areas reached 9. On that day, a takeaway boy was unfortunately hit and killed by a fallen tree.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 27, Shenyang, Liaoning. Workers at the Shenyang Railway Bureau said that they have reached retirement age, but the company has not paid social security contributions to the workers.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"We are not qualified to forgive on behalf of our ancestors🤡"
On July 26, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi met with Japanese Foreign Minister Yoko Kamikawa. He said that China and Japan are neighbors that cannot be moved away, and peaceful coexistence, friendship from generation to generation, mutually beneficial cooperation, and common development are in the fundamental interests of the people of both countries.
This statement caused a large number of netizens to break their defense and ridicule

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 18 (Release), Shantou, Guangdong. "Uncle on wheels" braved the rain to get food at Sanyuan Canteen. The uncle said that he was born in 1967 and was infected with polio when he was a child, which caused lower limb disability and he could only rely on wheels to move. Kind people helped the uncle modify his mobility tools and gave him some daily necessities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 27, Shanhai Ancient Music Festival in Yichang, Hubei.
That afternoon, the police suddenly broke all the flagpoles brought by the fans and confiscated all the flags. At the same time, they took some flag bearers to the police station on site.
